about.details:
Founded in October 2010, "Storage Technologies and Automation Limited is engaged in storage racking systems.

The company manufactures and installs metal storage racks, automated warehouses, and other storage solutions. The company provides storage solutions for various industries, including oil & gas, automotive, aerospace, food & beverages, pharmaceuticals, textiles, retail, and FMCG.

The company is an ISO 9001:2015 certified storage solution manufacturing company.

The company's manufacturing process is supported by approximately 56,250 square feet of space in Bangalore and 20,000 square feet of storage space.

To date, the company has executed more than 2500 projects and has served more than 900 customers worldwide.

The company has a presence in over 30 countries across the globe.

As of October 31, 2023, the company has a total of 166 permanent employees and 94 contracted employees.

faqs.question: What is the Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO is a SME IPO of 3840000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹29.95 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹78 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on April 30, 2024, and closes on May 3, 2024.

Integrated Registry Management Services Private Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO opens on April 30, 2024 and closes on May 3, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO?
faqs.answer: Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO will be done on Monday, May 6, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, May 7, 2024. Check the Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Storage Technologies Racks and Rollers IPO listing date is on Wednesday, May 8, 2024.
